articles.author: Harriet Sherwood
articles.title: National Theatre to stage The Odyssey in ‘epic, episodic’ retelling around UK - The Guardian
articles.description: Parts to be staged in Stoke, Doncaster, Trowbridge and Sunderland using local writers and amateur casts before finale in London
articles.content: A retelling of The Odyssey, Homers epic story of endurance and hope, is to be the centrepiece of a landmark project next year by the National Theatre in partnership with local artists and communities… [+3572 chars]
